column4: with ssh is port forwarding enabled by defualt? I keep getting a server has disabled port forwarding when using the -R
for ssh port forwarding you use "-L" not "-R" don't you?
im acutally trying to ssh into work pc from home without messing with the firewall so i think the -R is what i need to use.
ok, I'm not hot on ssh tunnelling. I know that I have to port forward all my traffic so I can connect to IRC, and I use the -L option.
